price: 4. Si Nous le voulions, Nous ferions descendre sur eux du ciel un prodige, devant lequel leurs cous demeureraient courbés.
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
